meanings.definition: A very short skirt or dress.
meanings.sent1: She wore a micromini to the party.
meanings.sent2: The micromini was popular in the 1960s.
meanings.sent3: The micromini twirled as she danced.
meanings.sent4: Her micromini was like a colorful flower petal.
meanings.sent5: The micromini accentuated her long legs.
